La déspota respuesta de hija de Maradona a su papá luego de que este la desheredara
Se trata de Gianinna Maradona, quien se pronunció en forma contundente mediante mensajes publicados en las historias temporales de su cuenta de Instagram.

05 Nov 2019, 17:18


“Decí lo que quieras; total, sos lo que haces”, escribió la mujer en palabras dirigidas para su padre, Diego Maradona, aunque sin poner su nombre.

Este mensaje apareció después de que el popular ‘Pelusa’ compartiera un video en el que decía que no le iba a dejar nada y que sus posesiones las iba a donar antes de morir.
El enfado de Diego, actual entrenador de Gimnasia y Esgrima de La Plata, obedece a que Gianinna dijo que a su papá lo estaban matando y les pidió a sus seguidores que rezaran por él.
Fue por ello que el exfutbolista reaccionó asegurando que su salud no tiene inconvenientes y que en su entorno están esperando la herencia que pueda dejar.
Gianinna, por su parte, habría dicho que estaban matando a su progenitor debido que lo vio en lamentables condiciones junto a distintas personas el día de su cumpleaños 59, explicó el diario Olé.
De esta manera se revivieron las disputas al interior de la familia Maradona, pues Diego sostiene un pleito legal con su exesposa relacionado con la separación de bienes, pugna en la que Gianinna y su hermana apoyan a su madre.

text:
Maradona's despotic daughter's response to her father after he disinherited her
This is Gianinna Maradona, who spoke bluntly through messages posted on the temporary stories of her Instagram account.

05 Nov 2019, 17:18


“Say what you want; In total, you are what you do, ”the woman wrote in words addressed to her father, Diego Maradona, although without putting her name.

This message appeared after the popular ‘Fluff’ shared a video in which he said he was not going to leave anything and that his possessions would be donated before he died.
The anger of Diego, current gymnastics and fencing coach of La Plata, is due to Gianinna saying that his father was being killed and asked his followers to pray for him.
That is why the former soccer player reacted by ensuring that his health has no problems and that in his environment they are waiting for the inheritance that he can leave.
Gianinna, on the other hand, would have said that they were killing his father because he saw him in unfortunate conditions with different people on the day of his 59th birthday, explained the newspaper Olé.
In this way, disputes were revived within the Maradona family, as Diego maintains a legal dispute with his ex-wife related to the separation of property, a struggle in which Gianinna and her sister support their mother.
